message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its unique value proposition, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering its potential impact on your business or personal endeavors, I'm offering it to you for an exclusive price of $15000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a premium rate, tailored specifically for individuals like yourself who appreciate excellence. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.
